title: Person of Interest - Sarah Shahi about Root and Shaw's relationship
author: POISuit
comment: "Root has liked Shaw since she laid eyes on her... Or an iron or her."
Perfect way of thinking about it - the fans deserved it.
Just recently discovered this series at the end of 2020 and binge watched all 5 seasons. One of the best series ever made in that kind of genre.
This actress is so beautiful.  I am currently watching now
Wow, she still very beautiful in ages 40yrs,amazing😀💖
